lyrics.text: Lesson 77. A successful operation. First listen and then answer the question.
lyrics.translation: 第77课：一次成功的手术。首先听录音，然后回答问题。

lyrics.text: Did the doctors find out how the woman died? The mummy of an Egyptian woman who died in
lyrics.translation: 医生们弄清楚了这位女士的死因吗？一位埃及女士的木乃伊死于

lyrics.text: 800 BC has just had an operation. The mummy is that of Shepen Mut, who was once a singer
lyrics.translation: 公元前800年刚刚进行了一次手术。这具木乃伊是谢彭穆特的，他曾经是一位歌手。

lyrics.text: in the Temple of Thebes. As there were strange marks on the x-ray plates taken of the mummy,
lyrics.translation: 在底比斯神庙。由于拍摄的木乃伊X光片上有奇怪的标记，

lyrics.text: doctors have been trying to find out whether the woman died of a rare disease. The only way
lyrics.translation: 医生们一直在试图找出这位妇女是否死于一种罕见的疾病。唯一的方法

lyrics.text: to do this was to operate. The operation, which lasted for over four hours, proved to be very
lyrics.translation: 要做到这一点就是进行手术。手术持续了四个多小时，证明是非常

lyrics.text: difficult because of the hard resin which covered the skin. The doctors removed a section of the
lyrics.translation: 由于覆盖在皮肤上的硬树脂，这使得手术变得困难。医生们切除了一部分

lyrics.text: mummy and sent it to a laboratory. They also found something which the x-ray plates did not show.
lyrics.translation: 木乃伊被送往实验室。他们还发现了X光片没有显示的东西。

lyrics.text: A small wax figure of the god Duamutes. This god, which has the head of a cow,
lyrics.translation: 一个小蜡像，是杜阿穆特斯神的。这位神有着牛头，

lyrics.text: was normally placed inside a mummy. The doctors have not yet decided how the woman died. They
lyrics.translation: 通常被放置在木乃伊内部。医生们还没有确定这位女士的死因。他们

lyrics.text: feared that the money would fall to pieces when they cut it open. Unfortunately, this has not
lyrics.translation: 担心钱在他们切开时会碎掉。不幸的是，这并没有

lyrics.text: happened. The money successfully survives the operation.
lyrics.translation: 发生了。这笔钱在手术中成功存活。
